comment: If three numbers are coprime, and the square of one is the product of the other two, then there is a formula for the other two in terms of ` gcd ` and square. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
